list_definition.definition: a shellfish with two shells joined together, used as food

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: clams served with herb butter and lemon.

list_definition.definition: to suddenly stop talking or to refuse to talk

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He clammed up when the police asked who had helped him to steal the car.
